Headline: #73 Armitage Temporary Reroute at Armitage/Kolmar
ShortDescription: 73 Armitage buses are temporarily rerouted via Armitage, Cicero, Fullerton, Kostner and Armitage: due to police activity near Armitage/Kolmar.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#73 Armitage buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Armitage, Cicero, Fullerton, Kostner, Armitage and over regular route, due to police activity near Armitage/Kolmar.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #55 Garfield Temporary Reroute at 55th/Cottage Grove-Garfield Red Line
ShortDescription: 55 Garfield buses are rr via 55th, Prairie, 59th, King Drive, Midway Plaisance, Woodlawn & 55th, due to police activity nr 55th/Cottage Grove-Garfield Red Line.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 55th, Prairie, 59th, King Drive, Midway Plaisance, Woodlawn, then resume their normal route on 55th, due to police activity near 55th/Cottage Grove-Garfield Red Line.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare- bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem near Western. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare- bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem near Western.

Shuttle buses are available from Forest Park to UIC-Halsted to provide connecting service through the affected area.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
